scripts.build: node ../../prebuild.mjs skiplang-std skiplang-json skipwasm-std skipwasm-json skipwasm-date skipwasm-worker skipwasm-monitor && tsc && skargo build -r --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --lib --manifest-path=../Skargo.toml --out-dir=./dist/src/
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist skiplang-std skiplang-json skipwasm-std skipwasm-json skipwasm-date skipwasm-worker skipwasm-monitor
